channel.title: Comments on: Brief Review of new book on Walter Benjamin
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Larry Yudelson
item.dc:creator: Larry Yudelson
item.description: Progress. The end of history. Revolution. A relevant line from the blog of writer <a href="http://www.antipope.org/charlie/blog-static/2010/12/utopia.html" rel="nofollow">Charles Stross:</a> <blockquote>It seems to me that one of our besetting problems these days is that there's a shortage of utopias on offer.</blockquote>
item.content:encoded:
Progress. The end of history. Revolution. A relevant line from the blog of writer Charles Stross:

It seems to me that one of our besetting problems these days is that there’s a shortage of utopias on offer.
